initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.

At the helm of this wave of innovation, in the globally acclaimed hub of trailblazing triumphs, the celebrated inventor, Dr. Lyra Novum, will unveil her groundbreaking invention, "The Harmony of Innovation." Predicted to draw an audience of half a billion, how will she manage the monumental pressure?

To present a captivating exploration of her brilliant creation, our fearless reporter, Zara, has boldly secured an exclusive interview with Dr. Novum, delving into her journey leading to the highly anticipated revelation.

Don't miss the heart-stopping culmination of the Exhibition of Ingenuity, airing on the Progress Channel and the streaming platform Embrace the New on Sunday, 7th of August.
